title: Mojave National Preserve: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Artist in Residence Mojave National Preserve, in partnership with the Mojave National Preserve Artist Foundation, offers opportunities for on-site residencies through its Artist-in-Residence program.  Volunteer Volunteers help Mojave National Preserve in a number of different ways. Find out about current opportunities to share your specialized expertise.   Planning The planning process allows the public to express opinions on the management of a national park. Find out if there are any current opportunities to share your voice or browse past planning documents.
